<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <rect x="250" y="100" width="300" height="400" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#FFFFFF" filter="url(#shadow)"/>

    <defs>
        <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#F0F0F0"/>
    
    <rect x="50" y="50" width="700" height="500" rx="10" fill="#FFFFFF" filter="url(#shadow)"/>
    
    <text x="100" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#333333">定期購読管理システム</text>
    
    <g>
        <rect x="100" y="150" width="600" height="70" rx="10" fill="#007BFF" class="menu-item"/>
        <text x="120" y="190" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF">顧客管理</text>
    </g>
    
    <g>
        <rect x="100" y="230" width="600" height="70" rx="10" fill="#28A745" class="menu-item"/>
        <text x="120" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF">契約管理</text>
    </g>
    
    <g>
        <rect x="100" y="310" width="600" height="70" rx="10" fill="#FFC107" class="menu-item"/>
        <text x="120" y="350" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF">請求管理</text>
    </g>
    
    <g>
        <rect x="100" y="390" width="600" height="70" rx="10" fill="#DC3545" class="menu-item"/>
        <text x="120" y="430" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF">発行スケジュール管理</text>
    </g>
    
    <g>
        <rect x="100" y="470" width="600" height="70" rx="10" fill="#6C757D" class="menu-item"/>
        <text x="120" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF">その他機能</text>
    </g>
    
    <defs>
        <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
            <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
            <feOffset dx="0" dy="3" result="offsetblur"/>
            <feFlood flood-color="#000000" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
            <feComposite in2="offsetblur" operator="in"/>
            <feMerge>
                <feMergeNode/>
                <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
            </feMerge>
        </filter>
    </defs>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="800" height="600" style="background-color:#F0F0F0">

<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <rect x="50" y="30" width="700" height="70" fill="#FFFFFF" rx="10" ry="10" filter="url(#shadowFilter)"/>

    <rect x="50" y="120" width="700" height="400" fill="#FFFFFF" rx="10" ry="10" filter="url(#shadowFilter)"/>
    
    <text x="80" y="170" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333333">通知タイプ</text>
    <rect x="80" y="190" width="640" height="50" fill="#F8F9FA" rx="8" stroke="#DEE2E6"/>
    <text x="100" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#6C757D">通知タイプを選択</text>
    
    <text x="80" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333333">通知先メールアドレス</text>
    <rect x="80" y="290" width="640" height="50" fill="#F8F9FA" rx="8" stroke="#DEE2E6"/>
    <text x="100" y="320" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#6C757D">メールアドレスを入力</text>
    
    <text x="80" y="370" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333333">通知タイミング</text>
    <rect x="80" y="390" width="640" height="50" fill="#F8F9FA" rx="8" stroke="#DEE2E6"/>
    <text x="100" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#6C757D">タイミングを選択</text>
    
    <rect x="300" y="480" width="200" height="50" fill="#007BFF" rx="10" ry="10"/>
    <text x="370" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">保存</text>
    
    <defs>
        <filter id="shadowFilter" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
            <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
            <feOffset dx="0" dy="3" result="offsetblur"/>
            <feFlood flood-color="#A0A0A0" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
            <feComposite in2="offsetblur" operator="in"/>
            <feMerge>
                <feMergeNode/>
                <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
            </feMerge>
        </filter>
    </defs>
</svg>
